scripts.development: SET NODE_ENV=development&& tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && node dist/index.js
scripts.staging: SET NODE_ENV=staging&& tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && node dist/index.js
scripts.prod: SET NODE_ENV=production&& tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && node dist/index.js
scripts.pm2:staging: NODE_ENV=staging&& tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && pm2 start dist/index.js --watch --name user-server
scripts.pm2: NODE_ENV=production&& tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && pm2 start dist/index.js --watch --name user-server
